View this post on Instagram
The lights were perfect at this wedding reception as compared to the two earlier weddings . Also this background was brilliant 🙏🙏🙏💯💯💯#kapilsharma #ginnichatrath #desibride #bigfatindianwedding #desiwedding ❤️❤️❤️❤️ @viralbhayani
A post shared by Viral Bhayani (@viralbhayani) on Dec 24, 2018 at 10:55am PST
title: From Dancing To Serenading Her With ‘Main Tera Hero’, Ranveer Has Eyes Only For Wifey Deepika!
description: Christmas has arrived and New Year is around the corner, but for Bollywood celebs, the wedding season isn’t over yet. After Deepika-Ranveer and Priyanka-Nick, it was Kapil Sharma and Ginni Chatrath’s wedding reception yesterday, which sought the presence of many stars including Anil Kapoor, Honey Singh and Mika Singh.
